nodes.bodyText:
@vbabenkoru
Do you think we should include this only when backend is ready? and everything is tested?
nodes.diffHunk:

 - nothing yet
 
+
+## [3.2.5](https://github.com/Iterable/iterable-android-sdk/releases/tag/3.2.5)
+#### Added
+- Introducing authToken. `setUserId` and `setEmail` methods now takes optional `authToken` parameter

nodes.bodyText: We should make the methods private and ship 3.2.5 without this note. Once everything is ready for JWT, make them public again, ship 3.2.6 and add a link to the JWT docs in the changelog.
